save-file-name.description: Name of the file for saving PD routes. For example, the name can be in the format of cfcard:/dhcp/xxx.pd or home:/dhcp/xxx.pd, where xxx can be any characters.

write-route-delay.description: The delay time for saving PD routes.

write-route-number.description: The number for saving PD routes. Only 40960 userinfo table items can be written to a board with memory less than 16 GB, and other boards support 1310720 userinfo table items.

server-groups.description: List of DHCPv6 relay server groups.

server-group.description: Configure a DHCPv6 relay server group.

server-addresses.description: List of DHCPv6 relay destination servers in a server group.

server-address.description: Configure a DHCPv6 relay destination server in a server group.

server.description: DHCPv6 relay destination server address in a server group.

global-packet-statistics.description: Statistics of a DHCPv6 relay global packet.

received-from-relay-agents-or-servers.description: Packets received from relay agents or servers.

relay-forward-received.description: Relay-forward packets received from relay agents or servers.

relay-reply-received.description: Relay-reply packets received from relay agents or servers.

sent-to-relay-agents-or-servers.description: Packets sent to relay agents or servers.

relay-forward-send.description: Relay-forward packets sent to relay agents or servers.

relay-reply-send.description: Relay-reply packets sent to relay agents or servers.

drop-packets-for-table-full.description: Packets discarded because the table is full.

drop-packets-for-general-error.description: Packets discarded due to general errors.

drop-packets-for-ipsec-authentication-fa.description: Packets discarded due to IPsec authentication failures.

iana-infos.description: List of identifying association for non-temporary addresses.

iana-info.description: Operational state of identifying association for non-temporary addresses.

iapd-infos.description: List of identifying association for prefix delegation.

iapd-info.description: Operational state of identifying association for prefix delegation.

group-dot1q-vlan-segment.description: Definition of the dot1q VLAN segment.

vlan-id-begin.description: Start VLAN ID in the user packet.

vlan-id-end.description: End VLAN ID in the user packet.

enable.description: Enable/disable Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol for IPv6.

cbs-value.description: Specify the session CAR CBS value.

pir-value.description: Specify the session CAR PIR value.

pbs-value.description: Specify the session CAR PBS value.
